subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
LOL!! I find thats what the skeptics say about ALL methods of ITC. Even funnier when they get results and are addressed by thier full names it tends to rock the boat they sit in. As usual I only speak from my own research over the years, my own experiences, results and opinions and suggest people try it themselves =) Good luck!

row row row your boat...

Misty




--- On Mon, 9/29/08, Leahs Odyssey <leahsodyssey@...> wrote:

> From: Leahs Odyssey <leahsodyssey@...>
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Monday, September 29, 2008, 1:01 PM
> Are you talking about the computer program EVP Maker from
> Germany?  All it does is jumble whatever come through the
> mike, there is no way to be sure you actually get anything. 
> Unless you know something that I don't about it.
> 
> Take care,
> 
> Leah
